title:
Flywheel, Remove and Install (Z 22 SE, Z 20
LET)

steps.text: Clutch plate and clutch pressure plate – see operation "Clutch Plate and Clutch Pressure Plate, Remove and Install" in Group K.
Flywheel from crankshaft – bolts, immobilise the flywheel with KM-652 .
Flywheel bores; flange surfaces of the crankshaft and the flywheel.
Flywheel to crankshaft – align the centring spigot, immobilise the flywheel with KM-652 , use new bolts, use 53 Nm + 25° to tighten the bolts evenly.
Clutch plate and clutch pressure plate.

torqueValues.component: Flywheel to crankshaft – align the centring spigot, immobilise the flywheel with KM-652 , use new bolts, use 53 Nm + 25° to tighten the bolts evenly.
